#summary Downloading or Maven access instructions

= Downloads =

Download the Sea Glass Look and Feel.

See the [Usage usage] page for more information.

== Maven ==

If you are using Maven, you may include the following in your `pom.xml' file:

{{{
<repositories>
    <repository>
        <id>seaglasslookandfeel</id>
        <name>Sea Glass Look and Feel Repository</name>
        <url>http://seaglass.googlecode.com/svn/repo</url>
    </repository>
</repositories>
...
<dependencies>
    <dependency>
        <groupId>com.seaglasslookandfeel</groupId>
        <artifactId>seaglasslookandfeel</artifactId>
        <version>0.1.5</version>
    </dependency>
</dependencies>
}}}

Note that between versions 0.1 and 0.1.1 nothing changed except the base package name,
which has changed from `com.seaglass` to `com.seaglasslookandfeel`, because the domain
seaglass.com is owned by a company that sells actual sea glass.
